[[inst_hl_cash]]
==== HL.CASH

*Syntax:* hl.cash<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, SrcD, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_cash.svg[HL.CASH encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* AMO

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"amo_kind": "CAS", "note": "User confirmed A", "source": "group_rule", "uop_kind": "AMO"}`
